name: Metal Assault
description: It`s finally here! The first episode of Metal Assault! The most hardcore thrilling VR shooter action presented in CES with HTC and PPGUN is finally coming to Steam. Intensive 30 minutes of the real arcade style shooter experience, dodging bullets, hitting explosive barrels, riding crane and fighting against all kinds of vicious enemies...
minimum_requirements: OS: win7,win8,win10 Processor: intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: win10 Processor: intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2000 MB available space
